name: Space Breaker (itch) (jaroslavjanik)
description:
Space Breaker

Space Breaker is a arcade game inspired by Breakout and Brick Breaker games.

You can use keyboard, Xbox and PS4 controller to play.

Game has currently 10 levels.

Controls:

Keyboard
Space - launch the ball
Left Arrow - move left
Right Arrow - move right
Escape - pause
Enter - continue / restart

Xbox Controller
X - launch the ball
L1 left - move left
L1 right - move right
START - pause
A - continue / restart

PS4 Controller
SQUARE - launch the ball
L1 left - move left
L1 right - move right
OPTIONS - pause
CROSS - continue / restart

Made with GDevelop 5
